Class NodeSamplerFactory

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.sampling.factories.NodeSamplerFactory
public class NodeSamplerFactory extends Object
Factory class responsible for constructing and configuring instances of AbstractNodeSampler used in simulation runs.

The NodeSamplerFactory determines whether a file-based or standard node sampler should be used based on the provided configuration parameters. It also supports dynamic seed switching by scheduling seed update events during the simulation lifecycle.

Key responsibilities:

  • Selecting the sampler type (file-based or standard) based on whether a file path is provided.
  • Parsing and applying initial seed chains, update flags, and switchover times from configuration strings.
  • Scheduling seed update events when time-based reseeding is configured.

Example usage:


 NodeSamplerFactory factory = new NodeSamplerFactory();
 AbstractNodeSampler sampler = factory.getSampler(
         "nodes.csv",
         "100,200,300",
         "5000,10000",
         "true,false",
         outerSampler,
         simulation);
Author:
Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University

  • Method Details

    • getSampler

      public AbstractNodeSampler getSampler(String path, String seedChain, String changeTimes, String updateFlags, Sampler sampler, Simulation sim) throws Exception
      Creates and configures an AbstractNodeSampler instance based on the given parameters.

      Depending on the supplied arguments, this method will instantiate either a FileBasedNodeSampler or a StandardNodeSampler. It also handles optional configuration of seed chains, update flags, and switchover events to support dynamic reseeding during simulation execution.

      Parameters:
      path - the path to a node sampling file; if null, a random sampling strategy is used
      seedChain - a comma-separated list of seeds to be used sequentially during simulation; may be null or empty if no seed chaining is desired
      changeTimes - a comma-separated list of timestamps at which the sampler should switch to the next seed; only applicable when seedChain is defined FIXME: is this simulation times or transaction ids?
      updateFlags - a comma-separated list of boolean flags indicating whether each seed should be modulated by simulation ID; must align with changeTimes
      sampler - the outer sampler providing higher-level sampling context
      sim - the simulation instance in which the sampler operates; used to obtain the simulation ID and to schedule events
      Returns:
      a fully configured AbstractNodeSampler ready for use
      Throws:
      Exception - if inconsistent configuration is detected (e.g., seed update times provided without seed definitions)
